subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: The departure of Brad Stevens, now coach of the Boston Celtics, has left Butler in search of a leader who can do what Stevens did: lead the Bulldogs to the N.C.A.A. tournament.
snippet: The departure of Brad Stevens, now coach of the Boston Celtics, has left Butler in search of a leader who can do what Stevens did: lead the Bulldogs to the N.C.A.A. tournament.
